sprache.email2: This e-mail address will be used when sending data to the users.
sprache.emaildownrestart: Server is down and could not be restarted.
sprache.emailfooter2: This text is inserted into the footer of an e-mail sent by the panel, for example, you can add your legal information here.
sprache.emailregards2: This text is inserted at the end of an e-mail sent by the panel, for example: "Kind regards,".
sprache.faillogins: Possible failed logins in a row
sprache.image_server2: If a master installation is not set up, the data will be downloaded from this server.
sprache.prefix2: Unique user IDs will be appended to their associated usernames. If you define usernames, only small letters and numbers are allowed. Example: customer will be customer2 and counting
